name: Lucid Drifting: Neon Nights
description:
A competitive drifting game for 2 players!

** Controllers required OR two players can play on one keyboard **

Keyboard Controls:
P1 - WASD/shift/space
P2 - arrow keys/comma/period

Credits:
Team Lead - Matt Woelk
Sound FX -Brendan Campbell
Programming - Ben Bergman
Art - Dustin Bogers
Countdown - Beni Reydman
Original Score - Daniel Bergman
Environment Art - Elyot Lamb

Featuring Karaoke Credits screen for Adrift (in the Dark of Night)!
